    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Web前端入门第 32 问：CSS background 元素渐变背景用法全解</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>渐变背景在 CSS 里面就是一个颜色到另一个颜色渐渐变化的样子。</p>
<hr>
<p>本文示例中，盒子基础样式：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">.box {
  margin: 20px;
  padding: 20px;
  border: 10px dashed rgba(0,255,0,1);
  width: 250px;
  height: 180px;
}
</code></pre>
<h2 id="渐变背景分类">渐变背景分类</h2>
<p>三种<code>基础渐变</code>：</p>
<ol>
<li>线性渐变 <code>linear-gradient</code></li>
<li>径向渐变 <code>radial-gradient</code></li>
<li>锥形渐变 <code>conic-gradient</code></li>
</ol>
<p>三种<code>重复渐变</code>：</p>
<ol>
<li>重复线性渐变 <code>repeating-linear-gradient</code></li>
<li>重复径向渐变 <code>repeating-radial-gradient</code></li>
<li>重复锥形渐变 <code>repeating-conic-gradient</code></li>
</ol>
<h2 id="线性渐变使用">线性渐变使用</h2>
<p>完整语法：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  linear-gradient( [ &lt;angle&gt; | to &lt;side-or-corner&gt; ]? , &lt;color-stop-list&gt; )  

  angle: 渐变角度
  side-or-corner: 渐变线的起始点位置
  color-stop-list: 渐变颜色列表
</code></pre>
<p>默认为垂直方向渐变，如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: linear-gradient(#ff4757, rgb(221, 255, 0));
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113803640-1941045943.png" alt="" width="350" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可通过参数调整渐变方向，如下将渐变方向调整为 70 度：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    linear-gradient(70deg, #ff4757, rgb(221, 255, 0));
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113808714-945640667.png" alt="" width="350" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>也可通过关键字控制渐变方向，如下将渐变方向调整为从右下到左上：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    linear-gradient(to left top, #ff4757, rgb(221, 255, 0));
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113903076-1753736245.png" alt="" width="380" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>多种颜色渐变，可在颜色后面添加百分比（也可以是固定像素值，比如 <code>200px</code>）控制颜色位置：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    linear-gradient(
      to left top,
      #ff4757,
      rgb(221, 255, 0) 30%,
      rgb(200, 0, 255) 200px,
      rgb(0, 186, 40)
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113915075-136940850.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>也可以使用两个百分比（或其他 CSS 识别的单位，如 <code>px</code> <code>em</code> 等）固定颜色占用区块，实现多个色块拼接效果：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    linear-gradient(
      to right,
      #ff4757 20%,
      rgb(221, 255, 0) 20% 40%,
      rgb(98, 0, 255) 40% 60%,
      rgb(0, 186, 40)  60% 80%,
      rgb(255, 0, 0) 80% 100%
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113934510-1329854598.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可设置多个线性渐变形成堆叠效果：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background:
    linear-gradient(217deg, rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(255, 0, 0, 0) 80%),
    linear-gradient(127deg, rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 255, 0, 0) 80%),
    linear-gradient(336deg, rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 255, 0) 80%);
</code></pre>
<h2 id="径向渐变使用">径向渐变使用</h2>
<p>完整语法：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  radial-gradient( [ [ &lt;radial-shape&gt; || &lt;radial-size&gt; ] || at &lt;position&gt; ] , &lt;color-stop-list&gt; )  

  radial-shape: circle(圆形) 或 ellipse(椭圆)
  radial-size: 渐变结束形状的大小，包含四个关键字（closest-side/closest-corner/farthest-side/farthest-corner）
  position: 圆心位置
  color-stop-list: 渐变颜色列表
</code></pre>
<p>默认的径向渐变从中心向外扩散，如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    radial-gradient(
      #ff4757, rgb(221, 255, 0)
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113944930-734283526.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可通过参数调整圆心位置，如下将圆心位置调整为左上角：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    radial-gradient(
      at left top,
      #ff4757, rgb(221, 255, 0)
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411113954702-1381671049.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>通过调整 <code>radial-size</code> 控制径向渐变结束形状的大小，如下不同值之间的区别：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    radial-gradient(
      ellipse closest-side at 30% 40%,
      #ff4757,
      rgb(221, 255, 0)
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114006078-1779523200.png" alt="" width="1050" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>也可设置多个径向渐变形成堆叠效果：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background:
    radial-gradient(circle at 50% 0, rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(255, 0, 0, 0) 80%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 6.7% 75%, rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 255, 0) 80%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 93.3% 75%, rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 255, 0, 0) 80%);
</code></pre>
<h2 id="锥形渐变使用">锥形渐变使用</h2>
<p>完整语法：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  conic-gradient( [ [ [ from &lt;angle&gt; ]? [ at &lt;position&gt; ]? ] || &lt;color-interpolation-method&gt; ]? , &lt;angular-color-stop-list&gt; )  

  angle: 旋转角度
  position: 圆心位置
  color-interpolation-method: 色彩空间，2023版本新增数据类型，参考文档：https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/color-interpolation-method
  angular-color-stop-list: 渐变颜色列表
</code></pre>
<p>默认的锥形渐变围绕一个中心点旋转，如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    conic-gradient(
      #ff4757,
      rgb(221, 255, 0)
    );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114022714-333354037.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可通过参数改变起始角度和圆形位置，如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    conic-gradient(
      from 45deg at 30% 40%,
      #ff4757,
      rgb(221, 255, 0)
    )
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114033270-582617149.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>也可通过控制色块区域绘制一个饼状图，如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  width: 180px;
  height: 180px;
  border-radius: 180px;
  background: 
    conic-gradient(
      from 45deg,
      #ff4757 30%,
      rgb(221, 255, 0) 30% 70%,
      rgb(98, 0, 255) 70% 100%
    )
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114042496-1462699898.png" alt="" width="200" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>使用锥形渐变可模拟 PhotoShop 的马赛克背景效果：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: conic-gradient(
      #fff 0.25turn,
      #C8C8C8 0.25turn 0.5turn,
      #fff 0.5turn 0.75turn,
      #C8C8C8 0.75turn
    )
    top left / 20px 20px repeat;
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114050687-384508105.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>也可设置多个锥形渐变形成堆叠效果：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: 
    conic-gradient(from 45deg at 30% 40%, rgba(221, 255, 0,0) , rgba(98, 0, 255,0.5)),
    conic-gradient(from 45deg at 80% 40%,  #ff4757 30%, rgba(221, 255, 0,0.1), rgba(98, 0, 255,0.5))
</code></pre>
<h2 id="重复线性渐变">重复线性渐变</h2>
<p>语法与线性渐变相同，在线性渐变基础上，多了一层重复操作，其效果如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: repeating-linear-gradient(
    from 45deg at 50% 50%,
    #ff4757 0deg 10deg,
    rgb(221, 255, 0) 10deg 20deg,
    rgb(98, 0, 255) 20deg 30deg
  );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114103543-1399925902.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="重复径向渐变">重复径向渐变</h2>
<p>语法与径向渐变相同，在径向渐变基础上，多了一层重复操作，其效果如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: repeating-linear-gradient(
    45deg,
    #ff4757 0px 10px,
    rgb(221, 255, 0) 10px 20px,
    rgb(98, 0, 255) 20px 30px
  );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114112055-247539667.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="重复锥形渐变">重复锥形渐变</h2>
<p>语法与锥形渐变相同，在锥形渐变基础上，多了一层重复操作，其效果如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">  background: repeating-conic-gradient(
    from 45deg at 50% 50%,
    #ff4757 0deg 10deg,
    rgb(221, 255, 0) 10deg 20deg,
    rgb(98, 0, 255) 20deg 30deg
  );
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/596097/202504/596097-20250411114119176-789808229.png" alt="" width="250" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="总结">总结</h2>
<p>在使用 CSS 渐变时，需注意浏览器兼容性，部分新语法可能在稍低版本浏览器中不支持。</p>
<p>渐变的使用不止于此，可以发挥想象力，实现更多炫酷效果。</p>
<p>参考资料：<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_images/Using_CSS_gradients" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_images/Using_CSS_gradients</a></p>
